body: select j.name as jobname,       js.step_id as step#,       js.command as ssislocation,	   case js.last_run_outcome		    when 0 then 'failed'		    when 1 then 'succeeded'		    when 2 then 'retry'		    when 3 then 'canceled'		    when 5 then 'unknown' -- in progress	   end as lastrunstatus,	   stuff(stuff(right('000000' + cast(js.last_run_duration as varchar(6)), 6), 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':') as run_time  from msdb.dbo.sysjobs as j       inner join msdb.dbo.sysjobsteps as js on j.job_id = js.job_id where 1 = 1   and js.subsystem = 'ssis' order by 1;
